Guarantee changeStatus(java.lang.Long guaranteeId,

getBuyers

java.util.Collection<? extends MemberGroup> getBuyers()
It returns the associated buyers according to the logged user. If the user is an administrator then it returns all buyer groups. If the user is an issuer it returns all groups according to the 'issueCertifications' permission. Otherwise it returns all groups which contains the logged user in its 'buyWithPaymentObligations' collection permission.

getGuarantees

java.util.List<Guarantee> getGuarantees(Certification certification,
                                        PageParameters pageParameters,
                                        java.util.List<Guarantee.Status> statusList)
Returns guarantees matching the given criteria

getIssuers

java.util.Collection<? extends MemberGroup> getIssuers()
It returns the associated issuers according to the logged user. If the user is an administrator then it returns all issuer groups. If the user is a buyer then returns all groups which contains the logged user in its 'issueCertifications' collection permission. Otherwise (if the logged user is a seller) return all issuers according to all its buyers. There is only a "@MemberAction" annotation without permissions because all the members could view the issuers.

getIssuers

java.util.Collection<? extends MemberGroup> getIssuers(GuaranteeType guaranteeType)
It returns the issuer groups which has permission over the specified guarantee type.

getRelatedGuaranteeModels

java.util.Collection<GuaranteeType.Model> getRelatedGuaranteeModels()
Lists guarantee's models which has the logged member (or operator's own member) as buyer, seller or issuer without take into account any other property.

getSellers

java.util.Collection<? extends MemberGroup> getSellers()
It returns the associated seller groups according to the logged user. If the user is an administrator then return all seller groups. If the user is an issuer return all sellers according to all (buyer) groups associated to its 'issueCertifications' permission. Otherwise returns all groups according to its 'buyWithPaymentObligations' permission

isBuyer

boolean isBuyer()
It checks if the logged user belongs to a buyer group

Returns:
true only if the logged user's group has the 'buyWithPaymentObligations' permission enabled.

isIssuer

boolean isIssuer()
It checks if the logged user belongs to an issuer group

Returns:
true only if the logged user's group has the 'issueGuarantees' permission enabled

isSeller

boolean isSeller()
It checks if the logged user belongs to an seller group

Returns:
true only if the logged user's group has the 'sellWithPaymentObligations' permission enabled

load

Guarantee load(java.lang.Long id,
               Relationship... fetch)
It loads the guarantee with the specified id, fetching the specified relationships
Security note: The implementation of this method must carry out the permissions control.

loadFromTransfer

Guarantee loadFromTransfer(Transfer transfer)
Returns:
the guarantee (if any) that generated the specified transfer.

Registers a new guarantee

requestGuarantee

Guarantee requestGuarantee(PaymentObligationPackDTO pack)
It creates a new guarantee from a pack of payment obligations

Parameters:
pack - a pack of payment obligations
Returns:
the new created guarantee

search

java.util.List<Guarantee> search(GuaranteeQuery queryParameters)
It searches for Guarantees

Returns:
the list of guarantees according to the query parameters

validate

void validate(Guarantee guarantee,
              boolean isAuthorization)
It makes guarantee's validation

Parameters:
isAuthorization - if true it validates the guarantee for authorization otherwise validates for registration
